files.description: Initialization script for the src package that enables package-level imports and configurations.

This file contains the QuranDataLoader class responsible for loading Quran verse data from a text file. It handles parsing lines in the format 'surah|ayah|verse_text' and converts them into a structured list of dictionaries. The class includes error handling for file not found scenarios and proper logging.

classes.name: QuranDataLoader
classes.description: A class that loads and parses Quran data from a text file. Each line in the file is expected to be in the format 'surah|ayah|verse_text'. The class provides functionality to read this data and convert it into a structured format for further processing.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the QuranDataLoader with an optional file path and sets up logging.

parameters.name: self
parameters.description: Instance of the class

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the data file. If None, returns empty data.

methods.name: load_data
methods.description: Loads data from the specified file, parsing each line into a dictionary with 'surah', 'ayah', and 'verse_text' keys. Raises FileNotFoundError if the file path is not provided or the file does not exist.

parameters.name: self
parameters.description: Instance of the class

files.description: Module defining the TextPreprocessor class which processes Arabic text. It performs normalization, tokenization, lemmatization, and root extraction, while logging each step for debugging and verification.

classes.name: TextPreprocessor
classes.description: A class for preprocessing Arabic text by normalizing, tokenizing, lemmatizing, and extracting root words. It logs various processing steps for debugging.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initialize the TextPreprocessor and configure the logger.

methods.name: preprocess_text
methods.description: Preprocess the Arabic text by performing normalization, tokenization, lemmatization, and root extraction. Returns the processed tokens joined by a space.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The input Arabic text.

files.description: Configures and returns a logger for the application, logging messages to both console and a log file named 'quran_analysis.log'.

functions.name: configure_logger
functions.description:
Configures and returns a logger that logs messages to both console and a log file.

The log file is named 'quran_analysis.log' and is located in the project root.

:return: Configured logger instance.

files.description: Main entry point of the Quran analysis application. This module orchestrates the entire process, including data loading, text preprocessing, execution of word frequency and co-occurrence analyses, and logging of results. It integrates various components from other modules to deliver a comprehensive analysis workflow.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Coordinates the application flow by setting up logging, loading Quran data, preprocessing text, and executing multiple analyses such as word frequency, co-occurrence, surah, ayah levels, word length distribution, and root word frequency. Handles errors gracefully and ensures logging shutdown upon completion.

files.description: This file implements a function 'normalize_text' that performs comprehensive Arabic text normalization. It removes invisible Unicode characters, strips Arabic diacritics, and maps various Arabic letter forms to their standard forms. Special handling is provided to convert taa marbuta to ha when it follows a ya.

functions.name: normalize_text
functions.description: Normalizes Arabic text by removing invisible Unicode characters and diacritics, applying a mapping to standardize Arabic letters, and converting taa marbuta to ha when preceded by ya. The function uses regular expressions for pattern matching and substitution.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The input Arabic text that needs normalization.

files.description: Module to tokenize Arabic text into individual word tokens using whitespace and punctuation as delimiters.

functions.name: tokenize_text
functions.description: Tokenize the normalized Arabic text into a list of word tokens based on whitespace and punctuation.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The input normalized Arabic text to be tokenized.

files.description: Module for Arabic lemmatization. Provides functionality to lemmatize Arabic tokens using CAMeL Tools.

functions.name: lemmatize_token
functions.description: Lemmatize the given Arabic token using CAMeL Tools. Returns the lemmatized form if successful; otherwise returns the original token.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The Arabic word token.

files.description: Module for Arabic root word extraction. Provides functionality to extract the root of an Arabic token using CAMeL Tools morphological analysis.

functions.name: extract_root
functions.description: Extract the root of the given Arabic token using CAMeL Tools morphological analysis. Returns the root if found; otherwise returns the original token.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The Arabic word token.

files.description: Unit tests for the Arabic lemmatizer function. Uses unittest and mock patching to validate the behavior of lemmatize_token by simulating the lemmatizer instance.

classes.name: TestLemmatizer

methods.description: Tests that lemmatize_token returns the token appended with '_lem' using a mocked lemmatizer instance.

files.description: Unit tests for the Arabic root extraction functionality. Validates the behavior of extract_root function with both valid analysis and fallback when analysis returns an empty result.

classes.name: TestRootExtractor
classes.description: Contains unit tests for Arabic root extraction, testing both cases when a valid root is returned and when no analysis result is provided.

methods.name: test_extract_root
methods.description: Tests that extract_root returns the correct root when the analyzer returns a valid result.

parameters.name: mock_analyzer_instance
parameters.description: A mocked analyzer instance to simulate analysis returning a valid root.

methods.name: test_extract_root_no_analysis
methods.description: Tests that extract_root returns the original token when the analyzer returns an empty result.

parameters.name: mock_analyzer_instance

files.description: This file provides functions for analyzing word frequencies in Quran text. It includes functions to: count word frequencies from tokenized text, analyze word frequencies at Surah and Ayah levels, assess word length distribution, and evaluate root word frequency. The module utilizes logging for detailed diagnostics and leverages Python's Counter from collections.

functions.name: count_word_frequencies
functions.description: Calculates the frequency of each unique word in the provided tokenized text. The input can be a flat list of words or a list of lists representing verses, and returns a dictionary with word counts.

parameters.name: tokenized_text
parameters.description: A list of word tokens or a list of lists of tokens representing verses.

functions.name: analyze_surah_word_frequency
functions.description: Analyzes word frequencies aggregated at the Surah level from Quran data. It logs the top 10 most frequent words for each Surah and returns a dictionary mapping surah numbers to their corresponding frequency dictionaries.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: A list of dictionaries each containing 'surah', 'ayah', and 'processed_text' keys.

functions.name: analyze_ayah_word_frequency
functions.description: Analyzes word frequencies at the Ayah level from Quran data. For each Ayah, it computes the frequency of each word and logs the top 5 words for selected surahs, returning a nested dictionary that maps surah and ayah numbers to frequency counts.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: A list of dictionaries each containing 'surah', 'ayah', and 'processed_text' keys.

functions.name: analyze_word_length_distribution
functions.description: Analyzes the distribution of word lengths in the tokenized Quran text. Computes total words, average word length, and identifies the most frequent word lengths, returning a dictionary that maps each word length to its frequency.

parameters.name: tokenized_text
parameters.description: A list of lists of words, where each inner list represents an ayah.

functions.name: analyze_root_word_frequency
functions.description: Evaluates the frequency distribution of root words in the tokenized Quran text. Logs the top 20 most frequent root words and returns a dictionary with root words as keys and their frequency counts as values.

parameters.name: tokenized_text
parameters.description: A list of lists of root word tokens, where each inner list represents an ayah.

files.description: This module provides functionality to analyze word co-occurrence within each ayah of the Quran data. It tokenizes the text and counts unique co-occurring word pairs, logging the top 20 pairs and the total number of unique pairs.

functions.name: analyze_word_cooccurrence
functions.description: Analyzes word co-occurrence within each ayah of the Quran data. It tokenizes the verse text and counts unique word pairs, ensuring pairs are stored in alphabetical order for consistency.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries, each containing 'surah', 'ayah', and either 'processed_text' or 'verse_text'.
